item.title: By: Emma @CakeMistress
item.dc:creator: Emma @CakeMistress
item.description: I made the ciabatta a few days ago and it was truly fabulous. I think I ate half the loaf in a day. So beautiful straight from the oven, slathered in butter. Thanks!
item.content:encoded: I made the ciabatta a few days ago and it was truly fabulous. I think I ate half the loaf in a day. So beautiful straight from the oven, slathered in butter. Thanks!

item.title: By: hungrygal
item.dc:creator: hungrygal
item.description: the best fresh baked ciabatta style bread I have tried was at a winery restaurant in the yarra valley - at De Bortoli - it was served with a dish of yummy fresh curd cheese mixed with herbs and topped with olive oil - divine
item.content:encoded: the best fresh baked ciabatta style bread I have tried was at a winery restaurant in the yarra valley – at De Bortoli – it was served with a dish of yummy fresh curd cheese mixed with herbs and topped with olive oil – divine

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: The texture looks great! I like the idea of an overnight rise too.
item.content:encoded: The texture looks great! I like the idea of an overnight rise too.

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: I really don't usually make a lot of breads, but I'm certainly going to try this one. I love the way it turned out...the crumb looks marvelous. Ciabatta is a favorite and won't I impress if I make my own?
item.content:encoded: I really don’t usually make a lot of breads, but I’m certainly going to try this one. I love the way it turned out…the crumb looks marvelous. Ciabatta is a favorite and won’t I impress if I make my own?

item.title: By: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.description: Great job Anita! Look at that texture-I could just cut off a slice and slather it with butter and be one very happy camper! :)
item.content:encoded: Great job Anita! Look at that texture-I could just cut off a slice and slather it with butter and be one very happy camper! ðŸ™‚

item.description: Love the look of the lazy bread! Great idea to same time.
item.content:encoded: Love the look of the lazy bread! Great idea to same time.

item.title: By: Emma @CakeMistress
item.dc:creator: Emma @CakeMistress
item.description: Oh Anita this post has got me genuinely excited!! Ciabatta is my favourite bread ever, and I can't wait to make my own now. Thanks!!!
item.content:encoded: Oh Anita this post has got me genuinely excited!! Ciabatta is my favourite bread ever, and I can’t wait to make my own now. Thanks!!!

item.title: By: bake in paris
item.dc:creator: bake in paris
item.description:
I have been doing some bread baking lately and now I stumble into your Ciabatta with excellent texture, how on earth would I skip this... and no kneading, bring it on :-)
Sawadee from Bangkok, Kris
